commands.name: az devcenter admin plan create
commands.summary: Create a dev center plan resource.
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin plan create --name
                               --resource-group
                               [--location]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--sku]
                               [--tags]
examples: az devcenter admin plan create --name "ContosoPlan" --location "eastus" --resource-group "myResourceGroup" --sku name="CCOG_Standard"  --tags CostCode="12345"

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan delete
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin plan delete [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--yes]

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan update
commands.summary: Update a dev center plan resource.
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin plan update [--add]
                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--remove]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--set]
                               [--sku]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--tags]
examples: az devcenter admin plan update --name "ContosoPlan" --resource-group "myResourceGroup" --sku name="CCOG_Standard"  --tags CostCode="12345"

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
